title: How to get a copy of a deed - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: In the U.S. deeds are recorded at a county office. Here in Oregon it’s’ called the Recorder of Deeds office, but it may have a different name in your county. You may be able to request a copy online or even print from an online image or data. If you want a paper copy there may be a small copying charge from the county.

A deed is a public record. In the US, you go to the courthouse where the property is located and put in a request for a copy. Some may have them available online or through an online ordering system..
